com.compomics.util.preferences

Class IdMatchValidationPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.util.preferences.IdMatchValidationPreferences
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class IdMatchValidationPreferences
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Generic class grouping the identification matches validation preferences.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel, Harald Barsnes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
